email-test.messageBody: This is a test email from {realmName}
email-test.disclaimer: This is a test email. Please ignore this message.

email-update-confirmation.messageBody: To update your {realmName} account with email address {newEmail}, click the link below
email-update-confirmation.disclaimer: If you don't want to proceed with this modification, you can safely ignore this message.

email-verification.messageBody: Someone has created a {realmName} account with this email address. If this was you, click the link below to verify your email address.
email-verification.disclaimer: If you don't want to create this account, you can safely ignore this message.

email-verification-with-code.messagePreview: Please verify your email address by entering in the following code
email-verification-with-code.messageBody: Please verify your email address by entering in the following code:
email-verification-with-code.disclaimer: If you did not initiate this request, you can safely ignore this message.

event-login-error.messageBody: A failed login attempt was detected to your account on {date} from {ipAddress)}.
event-login-error.disclaimer: If you did not initiate this failed login request, please contact an administrator through {contactEmail}.

event-remove-totp.messagePreview: OTP was removed from your {realmName} account
event-remove-totp.messageBody: OTP was removed from your account on {date} from {ipAddress}.
event-remove-totp.disclaimer: If you did not initiate a request to remove OTP, please contact an administrator through {contactEmail}

event-update-password.messageBody: Your password was changed on {date} from {ipAddress}.
event-update-password.disclaimer: If you did not initiate a request to update your password, please reach out to an administrator through {contactEmail}.

event-update-totp.messagePreview: OTP was updated for your {realmName} account
event-update-totp.messageBody: OTP was updated for your account on {date} from {ipAddress}.
event-update-totp.disclaimer: If you did not initiate a request to update OTP, please contact an administrator through {contactEmail}

execute-actions.messagePreview: Your administrator has just requested that you update your {realmName} account by performing the following action(s)
execute-actions.messageBody: We have just created your {realmName} account. Please set your initial password by clicking on the link below.
execute-actions.resetPassword: If the link has already expired, try to reset you password with your email at our login page.
execute-actions.furtherActions: If you have any questions or think you are the wrong person receiving this email, please reach out to {contactEmail} for help.
execute-actions.adminMessageBody: Your administrator has just requested that you update your {realmName} account by performing the following action(s):
execute-actions.adminMessageLink: Click on the link below to start this process.
execute-actions.adminIgnoreMessage: If you are unaware that your administrator has requested this, you can safely ignore this message and nothing will be changed.

footer.disclaimer: Important Notice: We are sending you this email because you have an account at {realmName}. This email is sent as part of our notification service. If you don't want to receive our notification emails in future, please reach out to {contactEmail}.

identity-provider-link.messagePreview: Someone wants to link your {realmName} account
identity-provider-link.messageBody: Someone wants to link your {realmName} account with {identityProviderDisplayName} account of user {username}. If this was you, click the link below to link accounts.
identity-provider-link.disclaimer: If you don't want to link account, you can safely ignore this message. If you link accounts, you will be able to login to {realmName} through {identityProviderDisplayName}.

magic-link-email.messagePreview: Someone has requested a login link to {realmName}
magic-link-email.messageBody: Someone has requested a login link to {realmName}
magic-link-email.disclaimer: If you did not initiate this login link request, you can safely ignore this email.

organization-invite.messagePreview: You were invited to join {0} organization
organization-invite.messageBody: You were invited to join the {0} organization. Click the link below to join.
organization-invite.disclaimer: If you don't want to join the {0} organization, you can safely ignore this message.

otpEmail.messagePreview: Someone has requested access to your account
otpEmail.messageBody: Someone has requested access to your account. Your One-Time Password (OTP) is:
otpEmail.disclaimer: If you did not initiate this request, you can safely ignore this message.

password-reset.messagePreview: Someone just requested to change your {realmName} account's credentials
password-reset.messageBody: Someone just requested to change your {realmName} account's credentials. If this was you, click on the link below to reset them.
password-reset.disclaimer: If you don't want to reset your credentials, you can safely ignore this message and nothing will be changed or reach out to {contactEmail}.
